data.name: Wrathform
data.tooltip:
Transforms corpses in target area into void energy which will attack nearby enemies (attacks once per second for <d ref="duckiesHeroHellborneCorpseBlastHolder_WpnDamage.amount"/> damage).

 Persist for <d ref="duckiesHeroHellborneCorpseBlast_VoidRiftPersistent.effect_expire_delay"/> seconds before disappearing.
